message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. We believe its value aligns well with your needs and expectations. Our initial offer for this exceptional item is set at $950,000. We hope this proposal is within your budget and meets your requirements. Please let us know if you have any questions or need more information.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the detailed information about the product.  While it seems like a good fit for my needs, I had a different budget in mind.  Would you consider a price closer to $650,000?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your position and would like to propose a compromise. How about we aim for a price closer to the midpoint between our previous offers? Our counteroffer is $775,000. This reflects a middle ground considering both the value we place on the product and your budget constraints. We're committed to finding a solution that works for both parties.

Alice, I appreciate you working with me on this. Your willingness to compromise is encouraging.  To be transparent, I have a hard limit at $700,000.  If you're able to meet that, I'm prepared to close the deal today.
